title: FS: T200 Fatima Philadelphia Athletics Team Card - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T200 Fatima Philadelphia Athletics Team Card - SOLD
posts.post_content:
All forms of payment accepted. PM over post.

Offering for a friend. I do not have the card in hand. Will broker a deal directly between you and him.

T200 Fatima A's team card. Multiple creases but still displays well. 5 Hall of Famers: Collins, Mack, Bender, Plank & Baker.

SOLD

Thanks for looking,
Tony
